org.daisy.dotify.formatter.impl.sheet

Interface VolumeSplitter


  • public interface VolumeSplitter
    Allocates a number of volumes required to accomodate the sheets, and determines the target (i.e. optimal) number of sheets for each volume. The maximum number of sheets for each volume is determined by a SplitterLimit.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getVolumeCount()
      Gets the number of volumes required according to this splitter.
      int sheetsInVolume(int volIndex)
      Gets the target number of sheets in a volume.
      void updateSheetCount(int sheets, int sheetsRemaining)
      Sets the number of sheets to distribute and adjusts the number of volumes based on the number of sheets that did not fit in the volumes of the previous iteration.

    • Method Detail

      • updateSheetCount

        void updateSheetCount(int sheets,
                      int sheetsRemaining)
        Sets the number of sheets to distribute and adjusts the number of volumes based on the number of sheets that did not fit in the volumes of the previous iteration.
        Parameters:
        sheets - the total number of sheets
        sheetsRemaining - the number of sheets that did not fit in the previous iteration

      • sheetsInVolume

        int sheetsInVolume(int volIndex)
        Gets the target number of sheets in a volume.
        Parameters:
        volIndex - volume index, one-based
        Returns:
        returns the number of sheets in the volume

      • getVolumeCount

        int getVolumeCount()
        Gets the number of volumes required according to this splitter.
        Returns:
        returns the number of volumes required
